periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. South southwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Thursday

High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 75 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.
